name: With (out) You
description:
- Without You -

You're "Silvia" A girl who moved to study at Countryside university, and then you met "January" her first friend. After that, you have developed your relationship and became lover in the end. but One day, something happened, January had committed suicide. Silvia felt melancholy and blame herself for what happened.

But then a miracle happened to Silvia, she has travel back in time. To the time when She and January just met each other for the first time. And this might be a second chance to her to make right and tell Jane that "All She want is to be 'With you' cause I can't live 'Without you'"

- How to play -

Talk with everyone (And yourself in some cases) to gain information.

Decide what to do and don't by both choosing choices and interaction with something in the scene.

- สมาชิก (Member) -

กันตพงศ์ วทานิยสกุล (Ganthapong Vathaniyasakul): Lighting Artist, Visual Artist

ธนยศ ศิรธรานนท์ (Thanayos Siratranont): Programmer, User Experience & Interface Designer, Game Director

เอกรัตน์ เจริญชัยพรสิน (Akekarat Charoenchaipornsin): Story Director, Story Writer, Level Design, Sound Designer

สหรัฐ เจริญสุข (Saharat Charoensuk): Translator, Animator

This game is dedicated project for GI452

Supervised by: Pongsathorn Kiatticharoenporn
